Method Summary
 java.util.List findGuestLimitedHostsByOrg(Org org)
          Queries an org for host systems, having the 'Limited Virtualization' entitlement that have exceeded their guest limit.
 java.util.List findGuestsWithoutHostsByOrg(Org org)
          Queries an org for guest systems whose hosts either do not have any virtualization entitlements or are not registered with RHN.
 java.util.List findGuestUnlimitedHostsByOrg(Org org)
          Queries an org for host systems, having the 'Unlimited Virtualization' entitlement, and the guest count for each host.

findGuestUnlimitedHostsByOrg

java.util.List findGuestUnlimitedHostsByOrg(Org org)
Queries an org for host systems, having the 'Unlimited Virtualization' entitlement, and the guest count for each host.

Parameters:
org - The org to search in
Returns:
A set of HostAndGuestView objects
See Also:
HostAndGuestCountView

findGuestLimitedHostsByOrg

java.util.List findGuestLimitedHostsByOrg(Org org)
Queries an org for host systems, having the 'Limited Virtualization' entitlement that have exceeded their guest limit. The guest count for each host is also fetched.

Parameters:
org - The org to search in
Returns:
A set of HostAndGuestView objects
See Also:
HostAndGuestCountView

findGuestsWithoutHostsByOrg

java.util.List findGuestsWithoutHostsByOrg(Org org)
Queries an org for guest systems whose hosts either do not have any virtualization entitlements or are not registered with RHN.

Parameters:
org - The org to search in
Returns:
A set of GuestAndNonVirtHostView objects
See Also:
GuestAndNonVirtHostView
